Tony Stark. apparently, he was extremely intoxicated because he stumbled to the door with a beer bottle in his hand and was wearing an Ironman boot thruster on his left foot. He took one look at Logan, and started laughing his head off. Then, without warning, he bent over, and upchucked. Logan winced in disgust. Leaning up, Tony shook his head to clear it. The attempt failed, and only managed to make him dizzy.

"Hey-" Tony hiccuped. "-Wolvey. Welcome to Avengers mansion. Join the party!" Before Logan could say anything, Tony passed out on the floor.

"Okay...." Logan stepped over Tony. He tried his best to conceal his gut, but his attempt was hardly making a difference. His belt had broken. He yanked it off and stuck it in his pocket. He noticed a rhythmic tune coming from downstairs. Like party music. He wondered if that was the party Tony wanted him to join, and if the other Avengers were downstairs. There were two staircases leading upwards and ending at an upstairs balcony, complete with several doors. Suddenly, Logan heard footsteps. And not footsteps from someone intoxicated. They were coming from downstairs. Logan had to think quick.
